about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a Frontend Developer
about.description1: Hello! I’m a frontend developer who loves crafting beautiful and practical UIs. I'm passionate about using modern technologies like React, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and TypeScript to build sleek and high-performance websites.
about.description2: I believe in detail-oriented design, clean code, and continuous learning.

contact.title: My Contact
contact.subtitle: Want to work together or talk about a project? You can reach me through any of the channels below.

section1.title: Frontend Developer
section1.subtitle: 2022 – Present
section1.description: Developed responsive websites using React, Next, Vue, Nuxt, Angular, and Tailwind. Collaborated with clients on UI/UX, and deployed with Vercel.

section2.title: Backend Developer (Learning)
section2.subtitle: 2023 – Present
section2.description: Built fullstack projects with Node.js, .NET, Golang, and MySQL. Focused on REST APIs and Authentication.

section3.title: IT Student
